data.name: The Book of Aaru
data.detailed_description:
The book of Aaru aims to deliver true rogue-like experience with no mercy. The only skill which can help achieving the victory is the skill of the player. You will fight in precision based combat, relying on dodges and parries. Timing and fast decision making is crucial for mastering the game.





Each weapon offers 4 different attacks, while you use 2 weapons at the same time. By combining the basic attacks of each weapon, you can achieve more powerful finishers.


In The Book of Aaru, you will have the opportunity to overcome not only enemies, but also trap puzzles. The harder the puzzle, the bigger the reward. It’s always optional to take the easier route. You just have to find out which one is it.


Map of the dungeon is wide, but can be remembered. That is beneficial to a player, while they can predict, which way keeps the bigger reward. But the order of the rooms in levels is randomly generated at the same time, which means player will never go trough a same dungeon twice!


You can expect strategical decision making when finding treasure loot, providing you with buffs. You will not be able to keep everything. You will have to decide if you value godly powers more than your life.

data.short_description: Seek ultimate Egyptian god power and reveal it’s mystery. Fight demons in precision & rhythm based combat, while crawling trough living and everchanging dungeon of Aaru. Experience true rogue-like game with no compromise.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 (3.3 GHz)/AMD FX-4100 (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 2 GB GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 (3.6 GHz)/AMD FX-8350 (4.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 760/Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 2 GB GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Core of our game is a rythmic combat viewed from isometric perspective. Blood can be explicitly seen, but is stylized. No other mature content than stylized combat violence is present.
